title: Why LB hasn't gotten a single skin?
body:
Seriously, what the hell? Her last skin Elderwood was release TWO years and 4 months ago! It's like Riot is completely ignoring her after the revert. I am starting to think Riot has petty vendetta against LeBlanc. Meanwhile Katarina gets like 2 skins in one  year. 
Don't tell me that there are others who didn't get skins either. Go ahead and complain about those champs, but I don't care about them.

replies.body:
{{champion:74}}

A lot of champs deserve skins. Leblanc is just one of many.
Honestly, I hope Leblanc and all Leblanc players/mains explode. Thank you for listening.
